With the booming trend of digital transformation, enterprise management software has become an indispensable part of daily business operations.

This article will explain the concept, benefits, and introduce the Top 5 most popular enterprise management software in Vietnam, highly rated and effectively applied by SMEs and SMBs.

1. What is Enterprise Management Software?

Enterprise Management Software refers to solutions developed with multiple features and modules to help manage all aspects of a business.

When enterprises apply these solutions, they gain various benefits such as cost optimization, improved productivity, enhanced customer experience, and stronger competitiveness, ultimately leading to higher revenue and profitability.

2. Key Modules in Enterprise Management Software

Currently, enterprise management software usually includes the following core modules:

  • Task & Project Management: Helps employees, managers, and executives track and control projects, tasks, and automatically set reminders for repetitive or upcoming deadlines. Enterprises can also design workflows for the entire organization or specific departments, enabling transparent performance evaluation across teams and individuals.

  • Human Resource Management (HRM): HRM stores the complete lifecycle data of employees, enabling accurate and faster workforce planning and recruitment. It also collects attendance and leave data, automating payroll processes.

  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM): CRM focuses on storing customer information, purchase history, feedback, and managing customer care throughout their entire journey.

  • Financial & Sales Management: Real-time data updates provide leaders and accountants with a complete financial overview, including revenue goals, financial reports, and sales invoices. Enterprises can plan cash flow management effectively and receive automated alerts for unusual fluctuations.

3. Criteria for Choosing Enterprise Management Software

  • Cost-effectiveness: Businesses need to determine whether they require a complete ERP solution or standalone functional modules. Trial and comparison across different solutions will help in making the right decision.

  • Support Policies: Post-deployment support is crucial. The vendor’s team must be highly skilled in both the software and business workflows to save the enterprise time and cost when issues or customization requests arise.

  • Interconnectivity of Modules: For integrated systems, the ability of modules to communicate in real time is critical for seamless operations across departments.

  • Flexibility & Customization: As businesses evolve, software must be scalable and customizable—supporting feature expansion, increased users, and tailored workflows or interfaces.

  • Integration with Other Software: A good solution must integrate with other business tools and platforms, enabling unified data access for quick decision-making and improved efficiency.

4. Top 5 Enterprise Management Software in Vietnam

4.1 MISA AMIS Enterprise Management Software

Website: https://amis.misa.vn/

With 30 years of development, MISA AMIS is one of the few solutions that fully covers enterprise management needs—from Finance & Accounting, Marketing & Sales, HRM, Task & Workflow Management, and more.

With 250,000+ customers and numerous prestigious awards (Outstanding Innovation Award 2023, Make in Vietnam Award, Asia-Pacific ICT Grand Prize, etc.), MISA AMIS is a top choice.

Key strengths:

  • Comprehensive modules: Finance – Accounting, HR (Recruitment, Payroll, Insurance), Sales & Marketing, Task & Workflow Management.

  • Tailored for Vietnamese enterprises, aligned with local financial, tax, and regulatory frameworks, ensuring fast and easy deployment.

  • Strong integrations: e-invoices, digital signatures, accounting systems, e-commerce platforms, banks, and logistics services.

  • Cloud-based: enables employees and managers to work anytime, anywhere, with real-time reporting for decision-making.

4.2 1Office Enterprise Management Software

Website: https://1office.vn/

1Office is an all-in-one management solution, inspired by global leaders but optimized for Vietnamese businesses. Currently, over 6,000 enterprises are using 1Office.

Key strengths of its 3 main modules:

  • Workplace: Digitalizes internal communication, automates task reminders, evaluates performance by department/individual, and builds an internal social network.

  • HRM: Manages employee records, labor contracts, insurance, attendance, payroll, recruitment, and training processes. Offers ready-to-use HR templates.

  • CRM: Manages customer databases, purchase/sales activities, inventory, and enables businesses to track receivables, payables, and profitability.

4.3 Base Enterprise Management Software

Website: https://base.vn/

Base is an online management software built on microservice architecture, focusing on enterprise operations through 4 main products: Base Work+, Base Info+, Base HRM+, and Base Finance+.

Key highlights:

  • Base Work+: Manages projects, tasks, company assets, and connects workflows.

  • Base Info+: Internal communication platform to promote culture, values, and interaction across teams.

  • Base HRM+: Optimizes HR operations such as recruitment, onboarding, attendance, leave, and performance evaluation.

  • Base Finance+: Manages finance, bank reconciliation, assets, and procurement.

4.4 FastWork Task Management Software

Website: https://fastwork.vn/

FastWork is a comprehensive enterprise management and operations solution, suitable for SMEs, accessible on both PC browsers and mobile apps.

Developed by FastWork Vietnam Technology Co., Ltd., it stands out with 4 main features:

  • FastWork Office+: Internal office management—documents, budgets, treasury, and meeting organization.

  • FastWork Work+: Multi-project management, task tracking, and construction project management.

  • FastWork CRM+: Improves telesales, customer data handling, sales & inventory management, and debt tracking.

  • FastWork HRM+: Face ID attendance, asset management, HR digitization, payroll automation, and multi-branch workforce management.

4.5 CoffeeHR Human Resource Management Software

Website: https://coffeehr.com.vn/

Unlike other platforms, CoffeeHR specializes in HR management. Developed by OOS Software, it is a Cloud HRM (SaaS) solution designed for SMEs, with over 10 years of implementation experience.

Key strengths:

  • Recruitment: Automates hiring and onboarding, centralizes HR data by department and position, and supports organizational chart design.

  • Payroll: Automates payroll, social insurance, and personal income tax processes.

  • Talent Development: Supports training roadmaps, competency-based evaluation, training effectiveness tracking, and welfare planning.
